quote: Call it an issue. Call it baggage. But I really hated lies. They're ugly things, festering like wounds, spreading like disease. They're winner-less crimes that hurt everybody in the end.
quote_letters: CALL IT AN ISSUE CALL IT BAGGAGE BUT I REALLY HATED LIES THEYRE UGLY THINGS FESTERING LIKE WOUNDS SPREADING LIKE DISEASE THEYRE WINNER-LESS CRIMES THAT HURT EVERYBODY IN THE END
